chapters.title: Chapter 1: Waiting
chapters.info: Uno Nomesta, p. 35 (20)—Shienaran soldier, chief among those with Perrin. He is missing his left eye and has a long scar down the left side of his face. He has a very foul tongue, a habit of which Moiraine is trying to break him of. He wears his hair in standard Shienaran warrior style: shaved head except for a topknot.
